name: ZeroPlot
description:
Hi

I hope you're doing great

If you want some absolute disappointment you've come to the right place.

I made this game for "Brackeys Game Jam" event.

I couldn't finish most parts of the game in time.

When I first saw the event, I was reluctant to participate at first.

But

I have committed to myself, to give some output. Whatever it becomes.

and here is what it is.

It was a challenging experience

Thanks to everyone that made this event happen.

Take care of yourself
And take care of somebody else

2021-08-28
